website_summaries.verdict: This umbrella's reverse system works well for keeping people and surfaces dry after it's folded.
pros: Has a unique structure that opens and folds in reverse, keeping water inside the double canopy
Easy to open and close, and not awkward when getting in and out of a vehicle
Does a good job blocking wind and rain
cons: A few quality issues, including broken handles and operating mechanisms with normal use, have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella was broken in the box- the umbrella top is secured to the frame by cheap thread and there’s no way to fix it when it breaks from what I could tell. I don’t see how it would hold up even in a light wind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: The Rods snapped on the inside of this umbrella withing 60 days of first use...for a 25 dollar umbrella this thing doesn't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Verolian

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting into car, but....
customer_reviews.text: Like the upside-down design, hate the handle. It can’t be hung on a grocery cart and umbrella is too long to lay across cart.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Litchka

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life? No more struggle with a wet umbrella - especially getting in or out of vehicles. It keeps the water contained and not all over the interior. The whole interior stays dryer since you don't have to open the door all the way in a downpour. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Pure Crap!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this umbrella about a year ago. However, since it is used when it rains, we only had three occasions to do so, the last being recently. The fabric held out okay. However, although a gust of wind prevented it from folding over, the handle snapped off! The photo shows the shoddy manufacturing process, creating a sizable hole below where the handle meets the umbrella stem. How fortunate for a seller to offer products most likely to fail (break) following the expiration of the warranty period.
customer_reviews.author: Rick G.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Better Brella
customer_reviews.text: Love the Better Brella. It's great to have the water inside when you bring the umbrella into your car. Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Christine E. Broz

customer_reviews.title: It operates so easy...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product & does its job well....I would gladly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bourque

customer_reviews.title: Best (1-person) umbrella you can buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is rad. It is made very well, kinda looks like a parasol when you open it up (my girlfriend squealed like she was...I mean...she squealed. She squealed when she opened it. It's a pretty rad design because when you close it you don't get water anywhere except under where you hang it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and works well. This size is good for one person.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Never buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought umbrella used it twice had problem with the lock to keep it open today drenching rain opened umbrella broke got l wet.discrace it's so chilly made not sure where I will never reccomend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco F. Noto MD

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Of course now that I have it no rain in sight. But I can tell it is very well made and the handle easy to hold on to.
customer_reviews.author: Nealy Moxam

customer_reviews.title: Love !!
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella.. easy to get in & out of vehicle... very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: The better brella is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I brought it for a friend for Xmas and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves. I want one, but waiting to see if they come out with golf size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: The Better Brella is a great umbrella. Easy to open and close and I am happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K Nemie

customer_reviews.title: Size Matters
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella works fine but is too small - smaller in diameter than a regular umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: The best umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy and a good size. It’s very easy to use. It just takes some getting use to since it works the opposite of a conventional umbrella I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Sutkaitis

customer_reviews.title: Not very stable.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the umbrella, but after using it several times it broke. One of the inside spiked broke and punched a hole in the umbrella. I could not fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella seems to be well made and is working out well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Joe T

customer_reviews.title: It is what they say! It’s worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I like it cause it does what they say! I’m ordering a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Jeda

customer_reviews.title: It is an awesome umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: I like this umbrella because it seems very sturdy,and I like the fact that it is wind-resistant. It opens up the inverted way,which is very convenient also.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Bensch

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Used it almost as soon as I received it. Raining in San Francisco ... I got a Uber and it was very practical to close the umbrella without getting completely wet. I do recommend this umbrella
customer_reviews.author: José Tolovi Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Unuasable
customer_reviews.text: Did not work properly, would not stay opened. Returned, and received no response
customer_reviews.author: Danny Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Product
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time I used I broke on open position. This is awful
customer_reviews.author: Aurelia A Moruzzi

customer_reviews.title: weak handle
customer_reviews.text: never got to use . slipped 0ut of my hand, handle broke in 3 pieces
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does hold up the wind
customer_reviews.text: The handle broke,and opening it gets struck it will not stay open
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better Brella Reinvented the Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Stable in wind, reverse “open&close” ingenious, completely makes sense when getting in and out of the car. Handle C-style provides various holding/carrying/storing options.
customer_reviews.author: DDodge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the better brella it's so sturdy and easy to carry around money well spent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ) Love it, it's going on my xmas list for ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I first opened it, considering I usually have to watch people around me. Now I just point it upwards and it spreads out around the top. Everyone wanted to know where I got it. This is the way umbrellas should have been invented !!! :) Love it, it's going on my xmas list for everyone on my list.
customer_reviews.author: PLC

product_meta.title: BetterBrella with C-Shaped Handle Reverse-Open 42" Umbrella As Seen On TV
feature_bullets: C-SHAPED HANDLE It has a comfortable, easy to hold c-shaped handle which can be used to loop grocery bags or purse and handle frees your hands to hold only the umbrella when the weather is not good.

REVERSE FOLDING It is an ingenious umbrella that uses reverse open-close technology that open or closes the reverse side, creating a water-proof cone that avoids moisture and wet surface when entering cars or moving indoors.

WIND RESISTANT The canopy is made of a high quality and sturdy material, making the ribs extra-durable and allows it to withstand wind speeds in excess of 50 miles per hour, or otherwise strong-enough gusts that will cause your standard umbrellas to collapse on by itself
EXTRA WIDE BRIM It has an extra-wide canopy that gives an extra protection from sunlight UV and avoids you from getting wet during rainy season.
THREE COLORS Available in three different colors which is the Red, Blue and Black so you could choose whatever suits you best.
